pullRequest.title: PLANNER-1764 groupBy on TriStreams
pullRequest.bodyText:
Introduces all groupBy() operations for Drools-based TriConstraintStream.
Since the amount of code was getting out of hand, this PR also spends considerable number of lines on unifying existing groupBy implementations and refactoring towards much more code reuse.

commit.message: Introduce all the target API methods
Implement the final uni groupBy operation
Implement the final bi groupBy operation
Add the same method for tri stream
First tri groupBy(), requires a code change to Drools

missing "the" before "first fact"
These 2 lines are incorrect:
"... to convert the first fact in the original tuple ..." and "... the second fact ..."
Each groupMaping converts the entire tuple, not a fact of it. They both get A and B as input.
=> "groupKeyAMapping never null, function to convert the original tuple into a first fact"
"groupKeyBMapping never null, function to convert the original tuple into a second fact"

nodes.bodyText:
avoid future tense "will".
Nice to have: in a javadoc, if a line ends, start a new line for the next one (so \n before between "stream." and "Neither". The javadocs html puts them together anyway, but this gives us "ventilated proze" in the source file, which is easier to author and maintain.
